spatial_accuracy.notes: Major mismatch between the 2D plan (large multi-room house with garage/alfresco/theatre/study/4 beds) and the 3D render (small simplified layout with only a few rooms). Room placement does not correspond (E2), wall layout does not match the plan perimeter or internal partitions (E2), doors are not located/oriented per plan (E2/E3), windows do not match the plan’s openings (E2), and overall proportions/scale are severely distorted vs the plan (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are largely incorrect (e.g., no clear kitchen–pantry–living–alfresco chain; no bedroom wing and wet-area core as shown) (E2). Multiple rooms from the plan are missing (E1) and the 3D introduces an alternate apartment-like configuration not present in the plan (hallucinated/incorrect room set) (E5). Door embedding is inconsistent with plan (E2/E3). Wall thickness appears visually consistent internally, but does not correspond to the planned structure (limited credit).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map to the labeled rooms/functions in the 2D plan (e.g., no identifiable theatre setup, study, correct bedroom count) (E2/E1). Scales look plausible within the render but are not faithful to plan room sizes because the room sizes/layout are not faithful (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is acceptable and the scene is readable. Lighting is clean and geometry is mostly artifact-free. However, it is not a faithful architectural/isometric translation of the provided plan (projection/scene intent mismatch), and some wall/door alignments look simplified rather than precise. Visual clarity is decent, but composition represents the wrong building.

detected_errors.description: Missing GARAGE (present in 2D plan, absent in 3D).
Missing ALFRESCO outdoor area (present in 2D plan, absent in 3D).
Missing THEATRE room (present in 2D plan, absent in 3D).
Missing STUDY and ENTRY/PORTICO/VERANDAH sequence (present in 2D plan, absent in 3D).
Missing multiple bedrooms and associated robes/WIRs (2D shows Master + Bed 2 + Bed 3 + Bed 4; 3D does not show this set).
Missing wet areas as specified: ENSUITE, main BATH, multiple WCs, and LAUNDRY are not represented per plan count/positions.
Overall room placement and zoning do not match the 2D plan (render depicts a different layout footprint and internal partitioning).
Kitchen/pantry configuration from the plan (central kitchen with pantry recess) is not faithfully represented; adjacency to living/alfresco is incorrect.
Door placements and swing/orientation do not correspond to the plan’s door locations (e.g., bedroom/bath core and entry connections).
Window placements do not match the plan’s exterior openings (missing/relocated windows).
Proportion distortion: the 3D model represents a much smaller/condensed dwelling than the large multi-room plan, invalidating relative room sizes.
Hallucinated/alternate apartment-like layout and rooms not present in the 2D plan (the rendered configuration does not correspond to the specified house plan).
